Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Ammanford, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - Kevin Gibbs (trombone) Mid Rhondda. Prizes - 1st £120, 2nd £80, 3rd £60. 5 bands competed.
